scripts.typedefs: cargo run --package scamplers-jsonschema -- --output-dir ../json-schema && deno run --allow-all npm:json-schema-to-typescript --input ../json-schema/ --output src/lib/scamplers-models/
scripts.check: svelte-kit sync && deno task typedefs && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
scripts.check:watch: svelte-kit sync && deno task typedefs && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --watch
